picks.text: At least one iPhone gets a 120 hz refresh rate display
picks.full-pick-text: At least one iPhone gets a 120 hz refresh rate display
picks.notes: • This was nearly a reuse of a previous pick before the live chat caught it. The fix was to specify an exact refresh rate to make it more specific.

picks.text: There will be a setting to disable the higher refresh rate in at least one of the new iPhones
picks.full-pick-text: There will be a setting to disable the higher refresh rate in at least one of the new iPhones
picks.notes:
• Was originally just a pick about a new, as-yet-unannounced iOS 15 feature, but the hosts suspected that was another reuse.
  • In retrospect, this was a tricky pick to grade because how would we know the day after the event? Federico provides some insider information indicating that the setting does exist, but can it be said to have "come true", as the rule states, without proof? The meaning of truth itself is debated, perhaps a philosophical high point for the Rickies. The point is ultimately granted, with the understanding that in the future, the rules will be amended to clarify that picks must be publicly verifiable to earn points.

picks.text: The Pro iPhone gets a new camera feature the regular iPhone doesn't get
picks.full-pick-text: The Pro iPhone gets a new camera feature the regular iPhone doesn't get

picks.text: The new Apple Silicon MacBook Pro will not be announced at this event
picks.full-pick-text: The new Apple Silicon MacBook Pro will not be announced at this event
picks.notes: • This was originally going to be "No Macs", but at this point everyone was on the lookout for reused picks and this one has come up a few times.

picks.text: The new iPhones keep the same screen sizes as last year
picks.full-pick-text: The new iPhones keep the same screen sizes as last year

picks.text: The Apple Watch SE gets a price cut
picks.full-pick-text: The Apple Watch SE gets a price cut
picks.notes: • Next year's model would, but not this year's.

picks.text: An iPhone gets an always-on display with a UI element that is reminiscent of Apple Watch complications
picks.full-pick-text: An iPhone gets an always-on display with a UI element that is reminiscent of Apple Watch complications

picks.text: An iPhone gets an updated Face ID sensor that supports partially occluded faces
picks.full-pick-text: An iPhone gets an updated Face ID sensor that supports partially occluded faces
picks.notes:
• Cannot be a feature that comes to existing iPhones
  • This feature did come in 2022, but didn't require new hardware.

picks.text: MagSafe is updated to support 20 watt charging or higher, but a new puck is required
picks.full-pick-text: MagSafe is updated to support 20 watt charging or higher, but a new puck is required
picks.notes: • This was originally just "faster charging", but the live chat pointed out a recent FCC filing by Apple which undercut the riskiness of the pick. Stephen added a specific wattage target and also had to decide whether the existing MagSafe puck will support the higher wattage.

picks.text: A new iPad mini is introduced with a refreshed design, new colours previously not a part of the product, USB-C, Smart Connector, and 5G support
picks.full-pick-text: A new iPad mini is introduced with a refreshed design, new colours previously not a part of the product, USB-C, Smart Connector, and 5G support
picks.notes:
• Originally a Risky Pick.
  • This was very close to coming true, but it was missing a Smart Connector.

picks.text: There is a ceramic Apple Watch
picks.full-pick-text: There is a ceramic Apple Watch

picks.text: The new iPhone colour will be a new version of a colour they've already used
picks.full-pick-text: The new iPhone colour will be a new version of a colour they've already used
picks.notes: • e.g. a new shade of blue, green, gold, black, etc.

picks.text: New Apple Watch is not a part of the presentation
picks.full-pick-text: New Apple Watch is not a part of the presentation

picks.text: Release date for iOS 15 is announced and it's later than 24 hours away
picks.full-pick-text: Release date for iOS 15 is announced and it's later than 24 hours away

picks.text: The iPhone Pro comes in 5 colors/finishes, not the traditional 4
picks.full-pick-text: The iPhone Pro comes in 5 colors/finishes, not the traditional 4
picks.notes: • This unexpectedly came true in spring 2022, when Apple added a new green color to the Pro line.

picks.text: The Apple Watch moves to 5G networking
picks.full-pick-text: The Apple Watch moves to 5G networking

picks.text: A new AirPods product is announced
picks.full-pick-text: A new AirPods product is announced
picks.notes: • This pick was one event early, as the third generation of AirPods came in October.

picks.text: Apple TV+ content is featured in the keynote
picks.full-pick-text: Apple TV+ content is featured in the keynote

picks.text: No specific preorder date is set for the Apple Watch
picks.full-pick-text: No specific preorder date is set for the Apple Watch

picks.text: iOS 15 releases the following week to the public
picks.full-pick-text: iOS 15 releases the following week to the public
picks.notes: • In other words, the week of Monday September 20th.

picks.text: The 9th generation iPad is introduced with a USB-C connector
picks.full-pick-text: The 9th generation iPad is introduced with a USB-C connector

picks.text: No date is provided for macOS Monterey
picks.full-pick-text: No date is provided for macOS Monterey

picks.text: New AirPods announced with a MagSafe compatible case
picks.full-pick-text: New AirPods announced with a MagSafe compatible case

picks.text: Apple will announce at least 1 new feature that will be coming later in the iOS 15 cycle
picks.full-pick-text: Apple will announce at least 1 new feature that will be coming later in the iOS 15 cycle
picks.notes: • ProRes video recording on the iPhone 13 Pro models will be coming "later this fall".
